mapper.select: select c.fullname as fullname, c.appellation as appellation, u.name as owner, c.company as company, c.phone as phone, c.mphone as mphone, c.state as state, c.source as source, c.id as id from tbl_clue as c join tbl_user as u on u.id=c.owner order by c.createTime asc limit #{skipNo},#{pageSize}

select c.fullname as fullname, c.appellation as appellation, u.name as owner, c.company as company, c.job as job, c.email as email, c.phone as phone, c.website as website, c.mphone as mphone, c.state as state, c.source as source, c.description as description, c.contactSummary as contactSummary, c.nextContactTime as nextContactTime, c.address as address, c.id as id, c.createBy as createBy, c.createTime as createTime from tbl_clue as c join tbl_user as u on c.owner = u.id where c.id = #{id}
